item.description:
Dinner With Friends and Singles CT.com

NEXT EVENT: THURSDAY NOV 12 2009- 6 pm

Enjoy a great dinner and meet new friends - and maybe someone special !

Our Dinner Buffet is prepared specially for us and includes:

* Beef Tips *
* Chicken *
* Pasta *
* Potatoes *
* Salad *
* Vegetables *
* Rolls and Butter *

Join Us for this great meal, conversation and FUN with other local singles who want to meet you!

Dinner starts at 6 pm, but we will be seating people throughout the night, so join us

Join us for the after dinner party at 9 pm for half-price admission

Enjoy a great Buffet at Shea's American Bar & Grill at the Singles CT .com table

Only $20 Online, $ 25 At The Event

RECESSION BUSTER â€“ Only $12 Online or $15 At The Event

Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... or call (860) 236-3343
item.how_to_find_us: Follow the Central CT Singles signs - We will be in the PARTY room

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends
